nodes.text: A Love-Wallop pill was a pill that could be slipped into a drink in order to more easily seduce the drinker. Wuher the bartender was known to sell them in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina in the Tatooine city of Mos Eisley and to charge high prices for them. The Gotal Feltipern Trevagg purchased and employed one during his seduction of the H'nemthe M'iiyoom Onith in 0 BBY.
